flavorText: Only from the sky can one fully understand the horrors of the wastes and the wonder of the Hekma's protection.

foreignData.flavorText: Nur aus der Luft begreift man wirklich, welche Schrecken in der Ödnis lauern und was für ein Segen das Hekma ist.
foreignData.name: Zenitsucher
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn du eine Karte umwandelst oder abwirfst, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Solo desde los cielos se comprende realmente el horror de los yermos y la maravilla de la protección de la Hekma.
foreignData.name: Buscador del cénit
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que actives una habilidad de ciclo o descartes una carta, la criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Il n'y a que depuis les cieux que l'on peut concevoir l'horreur des landes et le miracle de l'Hekma.
foreignData.name: Chercheur de zénith
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que vous recyclez ou vous défaussez d'une carte, la créature ciblée acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Solo dal cielo si scorgono davvero gli orrori delle lande desolate e la miracolosa protezione dell'Hekma.
foreignData.name: Cercatore dello Zenit
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta cicli o scarti una carta, una creatura bersaglio ha volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 不毛地の恐ろしさとヘクマの防御のありがたさをはっきりと理解できるのは、空から見たときのみだ。
foreignData.name: 天頂の探求者
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなたがカードを１枚サイクリングするか捨てるたび、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは飛行を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 鳥・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: 하늘에서 봐야만 불모지의 괴수들과 헤크마가 제공하는 보호의 경이로움을 이해할 수 있다.
foreignData.name: 천공 추적자
foreignData.text:
비행
당신이 카드를 순환하거나 버릴 때마다, 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 비행을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Somente dos céus é possível compreender plenamente os horrores dos ermos e a maravilha da proteção da Hekma.
foreignData.name: Buscador do Zênite
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que você recicla ou descarta um card, a criatura alvo ganha voar até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Лишь глядя с неба можно в полной мере осознать, что за кошмары бушуют в пустошах, и сколь чудесна защита Хекмы.
foreignData.name: Искатель Зенита
foreignData.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда вы совершаете Цикл или сбрасываете карту, целевое существо получает Полет до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 只有在空中才能彻底明白荒土的恐怖以及避世帘的神奇保护。
foreignData.name: 凌日探求者
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当你循环或弃一张牌时，目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 只有在空中才能徹底明白荒土的恐怖以及避世簾的神奇保護。
foreignData.name: 凌日探求者
foreignData.text:
飛行
每當你循環或棄一張牌時，目標生物獲得飛行異能直到回合結束。

name: Zenith Seeker
originalText:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: Giving a creature flying after it’s already been blocked won’t change or undo that block. If you want the flying to affect what can block the creature, you must cycle or discard a card during the declare attackers step at the latest.
Some cards have an ability that triggers whenever you cycle any card. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.
An ability that triggers whenever you discard a card doesn’t give you permission to discard cards. You’ll need another effect that instructs or allows you to discard them.

An ability that triggers whenever you “cycle or discard” a card triggers only once if you cycle a card. The ability “Whenever you discard a card” is functionally identical to this ability; cycling is mentioned for clarity.

If a player discards a card during their cleanup step due to having too many cards in hand, any appropriate abilities that trigger on discarding that card trigger. If this happens, those triggered abilities are put onto the stack and players receive priority in that cleanup step to cast spells or activate abilities (normally, no players may take actions during a cleanup step). Another cleanup step is created following that one.

text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
